creator: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Become a rookie boxing manager with something to prove, working to establish a stable of talented fighters to take on the world – in LEATHER®: Tactical Boxing Management.

Recruit promising young amateurs, established professionals or retired veterans, challenge favourable opponents, and train your fighters for upcoming bouts. Matches are won or lost depending on the strategy and tactics you devise, so it’s crucial to analyse both your combatant and your opponent to create the correct fight plan. Winning bouts will move your boxer up their respective weight division rankings, to eventually challenge for the world championship belt itself.

But the boxing world is a slippery one; losing bouts will delay your ability to challenge others, ruining your momentum and allowing other promising stars to challenge your position. Suffering injuries during bouts will lower your boxer’s subsequent fitness, meaning they will be less effective in the next bout unless given time to rest and recuperate. Boxers you seek revenge upon might shift weight division, foiling your plans for immediate payback.

Different boxers peak at different stages during their careers, and as time passes your boxers will age and their abilities will wane. Young, fresh-faced opponents will rise through the ranks to challenge your dominance, and wily old campaigners will battle on long passed their best, eager to show they’ve still got it.

The path to glory is not always clear, and it is up to you how you form your fighters’ careers. Do you ambitiously rush them up through the rankings – challenging as high as you can each time, or do you favour a steadier approach – building your boxer’s skills over more contests? Do you favour the breathless punch exchanges of the lower weight divisions, or the thudding power of the heavier ones? Will you dominate in one weight division for a decade, or will you shift your fighters from division to division, capturing as many titles as possible before their skills begin to wane? Do you allow your recruits to retire undefeated at the peak of their powers, or do you keep ushering them on for one more tilt at the big time, long after their abilities have deteriorated?

The choice is yours; there’s no end-game in LEATHER®. The only definition of glory is your own.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Physiotherapist and Nutritionist support staff types.
- Added tabs to items on hub newsfeed.
- Title holders can refuse challenges, vacating the least significant title held.
- Vacant titles cannot be contested by existing title holders, or boxers who are on a loss streak of more than 1 defeat.
- Boxers at ranks 11-20 can challenge up/down within those 10 ranks.
- Fight commentary log: tapping on the ringside commentary expands it.
- Added new Option: CPU Coaching Quality Level.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Upon turning professional, boxers can choose the rank they'll join the weight division rankings at.
* Added tournaments; often organised by sanctioning bodies to determine title vacancies.
* Added Morale attribute to boxers.
* Boxers are limited to having 3 support staff of each type assigned to them.
* Can Export/import saved fightplans.
* Can save fightplans in Exhibition Mode, and export/import them.
* Added difficulty Option to restrict recruitment of amateurs, based on gym reputation.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* All weekly bouts are now split into separate proper fight cards, with a specific venue (this will take a couple of game months to work itself through - previous fight cards will have been allocated a default venue).
* Boxers now have an Appeal value, and a brief personality summary.
* New Hall of Fame categories.
* Revamped boxer selection screen for support staff assignment.
* The 'Unified' achievement should occur when first win the titles, not just first defence.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New option to apply additional rank drops - boxers on losing streaks in top 10 will fall further.
• New option to apply ringcraft attribute masking (will only show the colours).
• New option to adjust referee injury sensitivity.
• Added an explicit “Hall of Fame”, with annual inductees.
• Can transfer exhibition mode boxers into the career mode: they'll appear in the recruitment list as amateurs.
• New cheats - the loading screen help texts will reveal these.

Do you favour the breathless punch exchanges of the lower weight divisions, or the thudding power of the heavier ones? Will you dominate in one weight division for a decade, or will you shift your fighters from division to division, capturing as many titles as possible before their skills begin to wane? Do you allow your recruits to retire undefeated at the peak of their powers, or do you keep ushering them on for one more tilt at the big time, long after their abilities have deteriorated?

The choice is yours; there’s no end-game in LEATHER®. The only definition of glory is your own.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Player boxers will be highlighted in orange in the newsfeed.
* Redesigned hub screen.
* Adjusted contract buy-out calculations.
* Adjusted loading bar visuals.

title: LEATHER® (Lite)

container.value: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK

creator: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Become a rookie boxing manager with something to prove, working to establish a stable of talented fighters to take on the world – in LEATHER®: Tactical Boxing Management.

Recruit promising young amateurs, established professionals or retired veterans, challenge favourable opponents, and train your fighters for upcoming bouts. Matches are won or lost depending on the strategy and tactics you devise, so it’s crucial to analyse both your combatant and your opponent to create the correct fight plan. Winning bouts will move your boxer up their respective weight division rankings, to eventually challenge for the world championship belt itself.

But the boxing world is a slippery one; losing bouts will delay your ability to challenge others, ruining your momentum and allowing other promising stars to challenge your position. Suffering injuries during bouts will lower your boxer’s subsequent fitness, meaning they will be less effective in the next bout unless given time to rest and recuperate. Boxers you seek revenge upon might shift weight division, foiling your plans for immediate payback.

Different boxers peak at different stages during their careers, and as time passes your boxers will age and their abilities will wane. Young, fresh-faced opponents will rise through the ranks to challenge your dominance, and wily old campaigners will battle on long passed their best, eager to show they’ve still got it.

The path to glory is not always clear, and it is up to you how you form your fighters’ careers. Do you ambitiously rush them up through the rankings – challenging as high as you can each time, or do you favour a steadier approach – building your boxer’s skills over more contests? Do you favour the breathless punch exchanges of the lower weight divisions, or the thudding power of the heavier ones? Will you dominate in one weight division for a decade, or will you shift your fighters from division to division, capturing as many titles as possible before their skills begin to wane? Do you allow your recruits to retire undefeated at the peak of their powers, or do you keep ushering them on for one more tilt at the big time, long after their abilities have deteriorated?

The choice is yours; there’s no end-game in LEATHER®. The only definition of glory is your own.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added CUSTOMISER to edit names of titles, sanctioning bodies, venues, rival gyms.
* New option to reveal your boxers' weekly ringcraft changes.
* Boxers in the 20s ranks can challenge up/down within those ranks.
* New overdraft facility.
* Added pundit unofficial scorecard option.
* All boxers now have a unique metabolism - coping with the demands of weight management differently.
* Added a new lower level title: "Continental".

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* During new game creation can choose to use male or female boxers.
* Numbered bouts: Adding "II" or "III" to fight card bouts to indicate rematches.
* Named fights: occassionally big fights will now have a name bestowed upon them.
* Added new Record section: Title Defences.
* Fitness loss calculation following bouts has been tweaked.
* Simplified bout volume options.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added choice to offer step-aside money instead of rejecting a challenge. The challenger then has to accept/decline this step-aside offer.
* Added shortlist of boxers facility for player gyms: called 'Watchlist'. You can add boxers you're interested in keeping an eye on.
* Added "Skip Round" button to skip seeing the action and just jump straight to the end of the round.
* Added breakdown of expenses on post-match earnings screen.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* New boxer profile sub-screen (tap the boxer style classification): houses personality, wear and tear, and grudges.
* Can create support staff in exhibition mode, and transfer them into career mode.
* New cheat: change nickname to RECRUITABLE - allows contract offers to otherwise unavailable boxers.
* New cut resistance value can be edited in exhibition mode boxers.
* Watchlist boxers highlighted in newsfeed, plus new option to view their fight cards.
* Reduced clinch effectiveness.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added amateur records and competition wins to boxers. This is for flavour, but does have a positive effect on the boxer's Appeal.
* Added new Sanctioning Body, the Multinational Boxing Organisation, and a new world title for it.
* Boxer personality values are now shown, rather than purely a sentence that describes them.
* Tournaments will now occur for lower level titles.
* Overhaul of fight footwork.

descriptionHtml:
Become a rookie boxing manager with something to prove: recruit promising young amateurs, established professionals or retired veterans, challenge favourable opponents, and train your fighters for upcoming bouts. Fights are won or lost depending on the strategy and tactics you devise, so it’s crucial to analyse both your combatant and your opponent to create the correct fight plan. Winning bouts will move your boxer up their respective weight division rankings, to eventually challenge for the world championship belt itself.

But the boxing world is a slippery one; losing bouts will delay your ability to challenge others, ruining your momentum and allowing other promising stars to challenge your position. Suffering injuries during bouts will lower your boxer’s subsequent fitness, meaning they will be less effective in the next bout unless given time to rest and recuperate. Boxers you seek revenge upon might shift weight division, foiling your plans for immediate payback.

Different boxers peak at different stages during their careers, and as time passes your boxers will age and their abilities will wane. Young, fresh-faced opponents will rise through the ranks to challenge your dominance, and wily old campaigners will battle on long passed their best, eager to show they’ve still got it.

The path to glory is not always clear, and it is up to you how you form your fighters’ careers. Do you ambitiously rush them up through the rankings – challenging as high as you can each time, or do you favour a steadier approach – building your boxer’s skills over more contests? Do you favour the breathless punch exchanges of the lower weight divisions, or the thudding power of the heavier ones? Will you dominate in one weight division for a decade, or will you shift your fighters from division to division, capturing as many titles as possible before their skills begin to wane? Do you allow your recruits to retire undefeated at the peak of their powers, or do you keep ushering them on for one more tilt at the big time, long after their abilities have deteriorated?

The choice is yours; there’s no end-game in LEATHER®. The only definition of glory is your own.
descriptionShort: Establish a stable of talented boxers to take on the world.

appDetails.developerAddress: First Floor, Telecom House, 125-135 Preston Road, Brighton, BN1 6AF, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added amateur records and competition wins to boxers. This is for flavour, but does have a positive effect on the boxer's Appeal.
* Added new Sanctioning Body, the Multinational Boxing Organisation, and a new world title for it.
* Boxer personality values are now shown, rather than purely a sentence that describes them.
* Tournaments will now occur for lower level titles.
* Overhaul of fight footwork.

appDetails.developerAddress: W8A Knoll Business Centre, 325-327 Old Shoreham Road, Hove, BN3 7GS, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* New Support Staff type: Talent Scouts
* Targeting tactics now specific to each range
* During training camps boxers can suffer small injuries, that deplete Fitness a small amount
* Added amateur record editor and 1, 4, 5 minute rounds in exhibition mode
* Adustment to close range punch damage and energy loss
* Body punching damage nerf
* Long range body punching combinations are smaller

appDetails.developerAddress: W8A Knoll Business Centre, 325-327 Old Shoreham Road, Hove, BN3 7GS, UK
appDetails.developerName: Hitsunk Games for Studio Industrial Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Completely re-engineered fight judging logic
* On Ringside screen injuries are colour-coded to indicate their severity
* Added paid concentrated training to decrease/increase weight in the heavyweight division
* Added Precocity attribute to exhibition mode, that governs the coached development uptake of young boxers
* Can now transfer career mode boxers and support staff into the exhibition mode
* Various bugfixes
